com.ontotext.russie.morph

Interface SuffixNest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SuffixNestImpl

    public interface SuffixNest
    SuffixNest.java The suffit nest keeps the inflection suffixes of a lemma with their respective morpho-syntactic type.

    Title: RussIE

    Description: Russian Information Extraction based on GATE

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003

    Company: Ontotext Lab.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    borislav popov
